code.html:
Last Update: Version updated!

What's New in Version 2.12 Version History

  • Now you can increase or decrease the values in the text fields using the up and down arrow keys on the keyboard.
  • Fixed inability to choose five spells.
  • Display of units/spells level and Amry Camps/Spell Factory capacity removed from the saved compositions.
  • Comments moved to a separate page, added “Contact Me” section, share buttons removed from the top.

You are viewing shared composition (you can find previous one in the saved compositions)

Version History

2.12
1 July, 2013

  • Now you can increase or decrease the values in the text fields using the up and down arrow keys on the keyboard.
  • Fixed inability to choose five spells.
  • Display of units/spells level and Amry Camps/Spell Factory capacity removed from the saved compositions.
  • Comments moved to a separate page, added “Contact Me” section, share buttons removed from the top.

2.11
17 June, 2013

4.53 updates:

  • Freeze spell, level 6 Lighting and Heal spells.
  • P.E.K.K.A. level 4.
  • Army Camps maximum capacity increased to 240 units.

2.10
16 June, 2013

  • Fixed iOS third-party browsers bug (when was shown only a white screen).
  • Buildings settings moved to the main tables.
  • Army camps capacity is now selected from the list of predefined values.
  • Slightly changed appearance.
  • Fixed a bug when repeated composition saved again due to subtract values.

2.9
12 June, 2013

  • Added “Share Composition” feature, now you can quickly and easily share your army composition with friends.
  • The word “calculation” as the name for the combination of the army, spells and buildings replaced by the word “composition”.
  • Repeated composition now are not saved when you press “Save Composition”.
  • Fixed iOS Home Screen shortcut bug (when was shown only a white screen).

2.8.4
7 June, 2013

  • Created Twitter account to post updates and other useful information.
  • Added share buttons and Twitter follow link.
  • Some text info from the top is placed above the comments section.

2.8.3
4 June, 2013

  • Added total cost with subtracted units.

2.8.2
28 May, 2013

  • Once again, optimized distribution of units between the barracks, especially when the difference between the levels of the barracks is significant.
  • Added copyright warning to the description of the page.
  • Added license.
  • Changed title.

2.8.1
23 May, 2013

  • Optimized distribution of units between the barracks when the maximum unit level less than the minimum barrack level.

2.8
23 May, 2013

4.14 updates:

  • Added Healer level 4.
  • Healer training time decreased from 20 to 15 minutes, housing space requirement decreased from 20 to 14 and training cost decreased for all levels.
  • Added Dragon level 4.
  • Added Golem level 5.

2.7
22 May, 2013

  • Fixed several bugs regarding the distribution of units between barracks.
  • What’s New block and Version History box.

2.6.1
6 May, 2013

  • Fixed a bug on iPhone/iPad when many units cause lags.
  • Bigger buttons to simplify tapping on iPhone/iPad (and other minor improvements: reduced indents, reduced font size of the headers, width set to fit the content).
  • Fixed a bug when all units goes to a single barrack.

2.6
5 May, 2013

  • Grouping units of the same type in distribution between the barracks (as much as possible).
  • Improved distribution between the barracks to reduce the time of production.
  • Performance optimizations (primarily on iPhone/iPad).

2.5.1
29 April, 2013

  • The maximum value of Army Camps Capacity limited to 220.

2.5
25 April, 2013

  • Dramatically increased performance, especially on iPhone/iPad.

2.4.4
21 April, 2013

  • Removed “Cost” column.
  • Removed background highlighting on table rows.
  • Removed help link for subtract.
  • Form controls optimized for touch-devices.
  • Wikia links.
  • Fixed a bug in which a long press on the plus/minus led to the selection of the text.
  • Reduced internal indent in the tables.

2.4.3
17 April, 2013

  • Subtract values does not saved with “Save Calculation” feature anymore.
  • Fixed iOS/Windows buttons height.
  • Fixed buttons gradient on Safari/Chrome/iOS.
  • Font for iOS changed to Arial.

2.4.2
17 April, 2013

3.124 updates:

  • Dark Barracks max level increased to 4.
  • Added Golem to Dark Barracks.
  • Production time for spells decreased: Lighting/Healing — 30m, Rage/Jump — 45m.

2.4.1
16 April, 2013

  • Added reset buttons.
  • New appearance for buttons.

2.4
14 April, 2013

  • Added awesome feature to “subtract” units, which you already have. For example, you want to get 100 Barbarians and 100 Archers. And you already have 20 Barbarians. In the column “Quantity”, as usual, make 100 Barbarians and 100 Archers. And in the column “Subtract” 20 Barbarians. Now the distribution between the barracks are considered to be only for 80 Barbarians and 100 Archers. This is very useful, when after the battle you have remained part of the army.

2.3.1
12 April, 2013

  • The correct order for keyboard navigation through TAB key.
  • Production time for each unit separately are no longer displayed (useless information).

2.3
11 April, 2013

  • Added lovely icon for iOS “Add to Home Screen” feature.
  • New favicon for easy identification of the site among many open tabs.
  • Retina graphics.
  • Internal optimizations for better performance.

2.2
8 April, 2013

  • Dark Barracks troops distribution.
  • Removed embedded font, font changed to PT Sans/Helvetica Neue/Arial, it greatly reduced the speed of page loading.
  • Army camps capacity increment/decrement in five points.

2.1
13 March, 2013

  • Dark Barracks troops calculation.

2.0.2
12 March, 2013

3.54 updates:

  • Wall Breaker capacity increased from 1 to 2.
  • P.E.K.K.A. training time reduced from 1 hour to 45 minutes.
  • P.E.K.K.A. and Dragon costs reduced.

2.0.1
5 March, 2013

  • Fixed a bug in which the units were distributed in barracks without accounting maximum barracks queue.
  • Fixed bug with negative number of units.

2.0
28 February, 2013

  • Added distribution of troops between barracks for optimal training speed.
  • The previous values of the maximum level and number of barracks, unfortunately, have not saved.
  • Production Time removed from saved calculations list.
  • Simplified tables layouts.

1.5
26 February, 2013

  • Reduced indents and font sizes.
  • The list of saved calculations is always shown.
  • Redesigned saved calculations layout.

1.4
17 February, 2013

  • Added saving of calculations.

1.3.2
10 February, 2013

  • Added description of the calculator.
  • Default values changed to maximum allowed in game.

1.3.1
9 February, 2013

  • Added auto-select of text in fields for simplify edit in iOS.
  • Fixed NaN in results and null in fields bug.

1.3
8 February, 2013

  • The title is replaced by the more similar to the contents of the page.
  • Added description for auto-save feature.
  • Added army camps capacity — allows to show free capacity.
  • Added maximum barracks level — allows show/hide unavailable units.
  • Added spells calculation.

1.2
6 February, 2013

  • Added plus/minus buttons.
  • Fixed IE 9+ support.
  • Changed favicon to app store game icon.
  • Added elixir icon to costs.
  • Added intermediate results of the calculations to the units table.

1.1
5 February, 2013

  • Added sixth level for Barbarian, Archer, Giant and Balloon.
  • Fixed Healer 1st level cost.
  • Number of barracks field replaced by the select.

1.0
4 February, 2013

  • Initial release.
